text: ‫ؠ‬ Certainly ‫ؠ‬ Probably ‫ؠ‬ Probably not ‫ؠ‬ Certainly not ‫ؠ‬ I don't know A vaccine for a new influenza virus can only be developed after the outbreak. There are, however, antiviral drugs such as Tamiflu and Relenza that may prevent the virus from dispersing through the body and that can shorten the illness period. However, it is unclear whether these antiviral drugs actually work for the new influenza virus.
